body.name: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080P Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam Three Way Triple Car Camera with Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 1 hr 29 mins
features: 【Three Channel Dash Cam for All-Round Protection】Dashcam built with a triple channel system, offer 170°Front camera, 140°Cabin Inside the camera, and 140°rear camera. Simultaneously captures video from the front, rear, and cabin of your car as vital evidence for dispute or accident.

【Dash Camera for Cars with Hidden Design & Easy to Install】Unique compact designed car camera, dash camera for cars combine three cameras with a tiny size. Won't shade your view or distract you whilst driving.

【Dash Cam Front and Rear】Dash Cam with 32GB Micro SD Card. You do not need to purchase this card. Simple plug and play operation, can record and play high-definition video. Format the SD card before recording.

【Dash Cam 24H Parking Mode】The dashcam will automatically switch to parking mode when you stop and turn off. It can record continuously for 24 hours in parking mode, and has time-delay recording function to record continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate, providing all-weather protection for your car

【Dash Cam with Night Vision】Combined with the Sony STARVIS CMOS sensor,4 IR LEDs, and the F/1.8 big aperture, this dashboard camera features super night vision performance, the license plate, and road signs can be clearly recorded at the night. The WDR technology balances the exposure and light/dark spots to create clear, color-accurate video even in low-light environments

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside Function: X86 dash cam front camera has a resolution of FHD 1920p*1080P, inside camera and rear camera, has a resolution of FHD 1280P*720P; the maximum aperture is F1.8, and equipped with high -performance sony sensor can bring super night vision and ultra -high -definition resolution to front camera 1920P (Ultra -HD)+ inside and rear camera 1280P (FHD) high -quality video), and capture clearer images during the day or night. Built -in camera can rotate 45 ° up and down, adjust the perspective of the car in the car, and protect your safety in all aspects，perfect for rideshare drivers such as Uber, Lyft and Taxi. X86 dashcam is equipped with a Type-C charging cable and car charging, which can better compatible with more models; LCD glass screen video viewing is more comfortable and can restore real scenes.

Package: Dash Cam X1 Rear View Camera with 18ft Extension Cable X1 11.5ft Car Charger with Micro USB Port X1 Mounting Suction Cup X1 Mounting Screws X2 User Manual X1 Power Interface: 5V /2A Display: HD Display, 2 Inch IPS Screen Video Resolution: Max 1080P/30fps Working Temperature: 14 to 140°F (-10℃ to 60℃) Storage Temperature: -4 to 158°F (-20℃ to 70℃) LIDOFIGO 3 Channel Dash Camera For Cars Making your driving under control all the time 1. Most popular and useful dash cam front and rear inside types for recording the situations of road front, passenger/driver inside, and the road behind simultaneously. Maximum provide enough security and peace of mind, avoid hidden dangers when driving, control your driving status all the time. 2. Adjustable camera using modes as need. There are 2 main dash camera modes for recording clear videos: A. 3 channel mode: Front Camera( 1080P Resolution/170°Wide Angle), Inside Camera(720P Resolution Loop Recording: OFF/1 minute/3 minutes/5 minutes Screen Saver: OFF/30 s/1 minute/2 minutes G-sensor: High/Medium/Low sensitivity (Default Medium) Parking Monitoring: Open/Close (Default Closed) WDR: Open/Close (Default Closed) Motion Detection Function: Support,2m

3 Channel Dash Cam The 3 channel dash cam supports record the situations of car front, cabin inside and car behind simultaneously at 1080P x 1080P x 720P resolutions.You can press the upward button to choose display the different dashcam modes.And The dual dash cam mode is still optional if you choose to not install the rear dashcam. 2.5M Motion Detection The 3 way dash cam will automatically start recording when detecting a moving object within 2.5 meters in front of the lens. It will stop recording when the image has no change for 20 senconds and save the recorded video from being overwritten.This function is only avalible when the dash cam is working. Super IR Night Vision With high-performance Sony STARVIS CMOS sensor, 4 IR night vision LEDs and F/1.8 big aperture,this car dash camera is able to increase exposure automatically in dark situations for capturing the clear videos footage, making your driving much safer at night.

Sensitive G-Sensor The reliable G-sensor(gravity sensor) will be activated once detect the collision or shake, which ensures the accident event footage could be safely locked and saved into the memory card without being overwritten. You can set the sensitivity to off, low, medium, and high according to your preference. 24 Hours Parking Monitor The dash cam will automatically wake up and record for 30s and lock the current videos when it encounters a collion even when it is powered off.Then it will automatically shut down. It will continue to boot and record for 30s when detcts a new collision.But the dash cam will continue to record normally when the power supply is always connected. Seamless Loop Recording In the loop recording mode, when the micro SD card is full, the dash cam will automatically cover the oldest videos with the newest videos.We offer an option that you could set the loop recording time to 1, 3 or 5 minutes. Important clips will be locked in a separated folder and will not be overwritten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear video in day and night
reviews.reviewText: I got the product today for a very cheap price but i am amazed with its quality. It has 1080p on front and inside and 720p on rear. The video is very clear both in day and night.It was very easy to install the camera following the instruction, the app works very well. Due to loop recording, the 32 gb memory comes with it is enough.I'm fully satisfied with this product and its a must have item for every car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice quality , good camera , and easy to install, i like this👍
reviews.reviewText: The 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside has exceptional camera quality, capturing detailed footage effortlessly. Its user-friendly design made installation a breeze, ensuring a hassle-free setup process. The night vision feature is outstanding, providing clear and reliable recording even in low-light situations. Combining superior camera quality, easy installation, and impressive night vision capabilities, this dashcam stands out as a top choice for those seeking a reliable and comprehensive solution for their car security needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dash cam for my new car and I'm very happy with it. The front camera and the rear records very clear. The installation was easy and the app works well. Also I like the Night Vision. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really like this 3 in 1 car camera. Easy to install and use. Great protection to drive in New York City.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to install. It’s installed on several of my cars. It’s very useful after an accident. It’s more useful than any testimony.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car dashcam
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this car dashcam, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. The video quality is exceptional, even in low-light conditions, providing clear and crisp recordings of my drives. The wide-angle lens captures everything I need, ensuring that I never miss any important details. The user-friendly interface make it easy to review and download footage. Overall, this dashcam has been a valuable addition to my vehicle, enhancing safety and peace of mind on the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Suites its purpose
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam does its job, and it’s relatively easy to install, but there are a few downsides to it. It doesn’t have amazing night settings; it’s hard to see through the lights to actual other cars, as I noticed when I played back someone cutting me off and found that you can only see their car once it’s directly in front of mine, even though the camera had the other car in its scope for the entire time. It’s not super quality video, but again, it gets the job done. The settings are a little difficult to navigate, and it almost seems like an older camera, especially with the loading screens and beeps it makes, which thankfully you can disable. The suction cup works great, but the fastenings for the back-up camera (the screws) were either missing in my order or misplaced, so I didn’t end up installing that portion. I only really wanted it for the forward-facing camera, anyway. The audio recording isn’t amazing either, you can’t hear things super clearly, but again, it does what it’s supposed to do. It’s small, so it doesn’t take up too much of your view, and the wire the plugs into the lighter outlet isn’t bulky, so you can hide it pretty easily in cracks. The power is a little finicky, though. If you don’t have it perfectly lined up, the thing will turn on and off randomly on long drives, over and over until it just sort of seems to make up its own mind and starts working again. So yeah, it works okay, but there are probably better cams out there for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I changed my car and this is the fourth driving recorder I bought. It is a must for those who drive in urban areas.
電源入れて画像のみ確認しました。素人見でですが、画質は十分きれいです。前方はしっかり写り、後方カメラは多少画像は荒れますが、ちゃんと確認できます。この価格なら十分だと思います。

reviews.reviewTitle: LINEで問い合わせ、回答早いです！
reviews.reviewText: リアカメラ画像がフロントカメラ側に映らず、困って説明書のLINE公式アカウントに問い合わせました。土曜に問い合わせをし、休みだから月曜だな...と思っていたら日曜に回答を頂きました！原因はリアカメラの配線が緩くなっていたようで、差し直して上ボタンを押したらカメラ切替が出来ました。とても困っていたので助かりました！
リアカメラの解像度が悪く、後続車のナンバーが判読出来ない。取扱い説明書も分かり難く不親切
問題なくできます。ミニバンサイズでもリアカメラのケーブルは余る位あります。最初はリアカメラ映らないの？てなるけどちゃんと映ります。とりあえずドラレコ着けてみようかな!ならいいと思います。
説明書もわかりやすくリヤカメラの配線を通す以外は本当に簡単に取り付けができました。先ずは大満足です。
